label: cascading_failure_01_ep_026
content:
## 2024-02-09 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 161500 | p50: 240ms p95: 650ms p99: 1240ms | err: 4.27% (6900 errors) | success: 95.73%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 160900 | p50: 215ms p95: 570ms p99: 980ms | err: 1.31% (2100 errors) | success: 98.69%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 156800 | p50: 410ms p95: 780ms p99: 900ms | err: 0.57% (900 errors) | success: 99.43%
- /auth: REQUESTS 209800 | p50: 55ms p95: 140ms p99: 265ms | err: 0.22% (460 errors) | success: 99.78%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 282700 | p50: 72ms p95: 215ms p99: 400ms | err: 0.21% (580 errors) | success: 99.79%
- /search: REQUESTS 247900 | p50: 98ms p95: 270ms p99: 490ms | err: 0.33% (820 errors) | success: 99.67%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 199900 | p50: 130ms p95: 370ms p99: 650ms | err: 0.41% (820 errors) | success: 99.59%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 82% | Mem 86% | Disk 63% | Conns: 8400 | Net: 790/960 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 79% | Mem 84% | Disk 62% | Conns: 8200 | Net: 770/935 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 90% | Mem 88% | Disk 62% | Conns: 9800 | Net: 980/1150 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 58% | Mem 86% | Disk 89% | Conns: 520 | Net: 220/270 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 260 | idle 0 | waiting 620 | exhaustion: 62 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 420ms
- replica: active 100 | idle 0 | waiting 160 | exhaustion: 24 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 140ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 410 | exhaustion: 72 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 560ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.3% | Bandwidth: 10.4 Gbps | Origin requests: 560900

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-01: geo_lookup_p99_ms=900
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-02: pool=primary events=62 waiting=620
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=860 retry_rate_pct=0.67

### Deployments & Changes
- Config change: third_party_geo pool max_size set to 120

### Events
- Increased third_party_geo pool max_size from 60 to 120
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Enabled geo response caching in service-B for 10 minutes
- Added new synthetic probe for geo vendor from eu-west-1

### On-Call
- Shift: R. Alvarez. 22 pages. 8 tickets (POOL-661, VEND-130, SRV-B-301 cache, CO-900, GW-425, SYN-52, NET-402, OBS-255). Status: Mitigating.
